resources.string:
This test app compares the performance between conventional Android File I/O and the "Storage Access Framework" (SAF). All apps will be required to use the SAF in Android Q / Android 10 for general file access.
 
This test visits each directory in the user-accessible internal storage to count files, folders, and total file size.
 
A file manager or other application will perform a similar operation to build an index, search, or help the user clean up unnecessary files.

Warning: sizes differ significantly.
 
* Ensure you have selected the device's "Internal Storage" as the SAF Target.
 
* (Android Q+ Only) Ensure this app (nextapp.saftest) has been granted legacy-storage access by appops.
 
On Android Q, you must execute the following command via adb on a computer to grant legacy-storage access (on a single line), and then restart the app:
 
adb shell cmd appops set nextapp.saftest android:legacy_storage allow
